name: Color Swipe
description:
Game Jam Submission for Friday Night Game Jam "Palette Challenge"

INSTRUCTIONS

Use swipe motions with your mouse on the screen to match the color on the left to the color of the falling block as it crosses the midpoint line to earn points.  Be warned - the blocks will fall faster as you get more and more points!

GAME JAM REQUIREMENTS

3 hours to develop a game using the random color palette selected. My palette code is:

https://coolors.co/afc2d5-272727-ffa69e-856084-de0d92
